text: [Ej musulmonon] Imruz xurokhoi pokiza ʙarojaton halol sudaast va [zaʙoihu] ƣizoi ahli kitoʙ ʙaroi sumo halol ast va ƣizoi sumo [niz] ʙaroi onon halol ast va [hamcunin izdivoc ʙo] zanoni pokdomani musulmon va zanoni pokdoman az [ahli kitoʙ, ja'ne] kasone, ki pes az sumo ʙa onon kitoʙ [-i osmoni] doda sudaast [halol meʙosad], ʙa sarti on ki mahrijahoi ononro ʙipardozed, dar hole ki xud pokdoman ʙosed, na zinokor ʙosed va na [zanonro] pinhoni ʙa dusti ʙigired. Va har ki ʙa [arkoni] imon kufr ʙivarzad, hatman, amalas taʙoh sudaast va dar oxirat az zijondidagon xohad ʙud
